text: @rahulkanwal It’s precisely about their stupid wildlife act acc. to which they consider all wildlife species as a property of state, continue to hunt them and their wet markets continue to sell all kinds of meat that produces new complex viruses from time to time . SARS , MERS and now COVID19

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
